description: speaks in a clear, concise, thorough manner
shows excitement and enthusiasm for the job
works well with others, adapts and accommodates
is motivated and driven, sets clear goals that align with work
adapts well to new or changing situations
good work ethic, reliable and trustworthy
faces problems head-on, is honest and upfront
versatile, thinks outside the box, enjoys problem-solving
prioritizes and organizes time and tasks well
quick to learn and apply new knowledge and skills
